name: Cyberhorde
description:
Cyberhorde is a bullet-hell fps. You need to fight with waves of enemies and one boss.

Each wave you'll gain a supply box in the middle of the map.

Made for Brackeys GameJam 2021.2

Game can contain some bugs.

Controls :

WSAD - move

CTRL - crouch/slide

Mouse - shoot

Space - Jump

ESC - go to menu
